productName: Nature Valley Granola Cinnamon Crunchy Granola, 16 OZ Resealable Bag
productDetails: Brand: Nature Valley, Diet type: Kosher, Flavour: Cinnamon, Age range (description): Adult, Item form: GRANOLA, Specialty: Whole Grain, Unit count: 16 Ounce, Number of items: 1, Package information: Bag, Item weight: 16 Ounces

reviews.body: This is so good! My whole family likes it. It would be amazing on top of yogurt. We just ate it dry and it tastes so good!

Enjoy this very much.
Adds a nice flavor as a yogurt or certain ice cream topping.

Okay not really but you haven't experienced happiness until you can eat Nature Valley granola bars for dinner by the handful. Large chunks, crunch is amazing. Ordering more as i feed. These are good enough to satisfy a cookie craving and they dont have wheat!
I find this product a great value , I can easily snack from the bag or pour into a bowl. Doesn't hurt that it's my long time favorite granola .
Good flavor. I’d prefer more crunch.

This bag of granola pieces do not contain any nuts like the bars of the same brand. I still check the ingredients and packaging every time I buy a new bag just in case since manufacturers make changes without notice. My son and I love this snack. Perfectly pairs well with any yogurt and fresh fruit. I added this to a subscription.

These are really great! I can Finish a whole Bag in one sitting, NOT! It's really a BIG Bag for the Price/Great Value. Where's the Peanut-nutter though? I had to settle for the Honey Flavor this time around but it's still a 5 Star Item. Bear Naked Granola Bites beat out Natures Valley any day but the Price is a bit more Steepened on the Bear. LOVE IT!
Love the big crunchy pieces. This is my favorite granola and taste great
Came as shown.
Enjoyed
I mix with a less sweet to offset.

I tried these for the first time and and enjoyed them. Many of the pieces are large chunks, but I just crush them to the desired size. One could just as easily purchase the nature valley bars and crush them. I didn't do a price comparison so I don't know which would be more economical. I like to sprinkle these on my yogurt.
Very flavorful, packaging was easy to open and reseal. Even the last spoon full still had some crunch. I deducted a point because the cost per ounce was higher than most of the other brands.
i've eaten the bar style of this for many years so I'm familiar with it andlike it alot. I would highly recommend it to anyone that enjoys granola.

Granola, granola, and more granola! If you love to eat granola as a snack or to add to your yogurt, cereal, and fruit -- choose this brand. It's delicious and a great price for the size bag you receive.

Was purchasing HEB Granola cereal with pecans. Either HEB has stopped selling this type as it has not been on the Amazon website or HEB's. Have tried different versions from the grocery store, but none measure up to the HEB brand I liked. Usually purchase this Nature Valley brand in the bars and then break up to place in my yogurt. This type of granola is okay for cereal with milk although a bit sweet. Will purchase again, but still on the look out for the HEB brand.
4 big bags for the price is awesome. We eat a lot of granola. This is the best way to buy it.
For snacking several times a day!

These are basically Nature Valley's granola bars all crushed up. They are nice and crunchy and go great with milk. Tastes fresh and it goes well with milk and sprinkled on yogurt. Although if the granola bars are on sale, it might make more sense (price wise) for you to just crush them up on your own.
I buy granola often and found this Nature Valley package that is just crushed up Nature Valley bars. It’s great and the kids love it too!
Love this granola - I think it’s far above any other granola I have ever had! Fresh, awesome taste from every piece! My favorite of all time!
Leftover broken up bars.

The cereal is 5 stars and is great. Basically it's Nature Valley's Oat and Honey Granola bar broken up for use as cereal. The real problem is it gets sent in a soft, Tyvek type envelope so when it arrives it is pretty much smashed into crumbs. Too bad, the cereal is hard to find for me. No more orders until I know the packaging has been changed to better protect the cereal.

I don't like the type of resealable seal on the bag. It's not a moisture barrier. I do like the way it the seal keeps the bag closed though. I liked the original recipe of this granola. When it was crunchier.

If you want to find an awesome granola that is crunchy then look no further. This stuff is SO good I keep it on my shelf for several different reasons. Alone.....mixed in with other cereals.....added to my popcorn for an afternoon snack......dipped in French vanilla yogurt.......I could go on. Favorite snack is chopped apple, walnuts and yogurt...with of course the granola. Good size package at a great price. Well...you just can't go wrong.

Hey People, when you buy any Granola in the supermarket, LOOK at the % of sugar + added sugars(sugar Alcohol) and then look at nutrients of this product.....BIG difference. Also Amazon had a deal where you buy 4 each and get terrific deal
great
I hoped this would be granola clusters, for yogurt or as cereal. Instead it seemed to be all the broken pieces of Nature Valley granola bars - rock hard and random sizes. Not for me!
It tastes great with fruit and yogurt. I love it.
Great taste. Good value.

I love this granola. The clusters are bite sized and not flaky. The added hint of honey sweetens up anything you put it in. My favorite thing to add this granola to is yogurt with some fresh fruit! Enjoy!
Probably about 15% chunks and the rest was just crumbs will not buy again.
I have looked for the bars & can never find them. I found this & bought 2 bags! One bag is empty, except for the broken crumbs, which I will add to my yogurt. Will buy again.

It’s the first time buying these. I love the bars and take them to work daily. I bought this for home to snack on and my wife ended up using some for her yogurts! Makes more sense having this for home use rather than breaking up my bars for snacking and for my wife’s yogurt. Still debating on trying this as cereal. Who knows. Love the bars and love this too!
It's easier to chew than the granola bars. However, it was 3/4 crumbs in stead of pieces. Had to eat it with a spoon.
A must-have for my morning yogurt & fruit parfait! Have not found any other brand this tasty and perfect texture.

It didn’t look like it was on purpose just looked like a bad bag. But money was still wasted so I have to give it a 3 star. The granola is usually really good. I have bought this product more than once and it was fine other times.

Eat a small amount it’s filling
Softens up with milk
Its crunchy texture adds a satisfying bite to breakfast or snack time.
Very tasty and fresh. You get alot for the price too.
I had never thought make cereals with The bag of granolas and I could actually say they were delicious
I bought this to use in my smoothie bowl, but almost ended up eating all of them out the bag directly. They are so good.
My boys love it. Can't keep enough in stock.
Didn’t like a ripped bag! Was planning to have for snacking! Not now
It blends in with the cereal and fruit I eat with it.

Fresh 100%. Wanting Nature Valley to get bigger pieces into bag instead of 7/8 of bag small granola. You can see as complaint and remove because of deceptive 5 Stars. Good price for the amount of granola. And taste is good. I have order 5 or more times. Might not order anymore because of small granola pieces. My money is tight too. I might switch to bars with Nature Valley. I have had them in the past and thought I could purchase this bag and get cheaper. Good on yogurt and handfuls to mouth. And a little heavy tasting but I like the heavy bars and chunks.

The bag looks nice.. but trying to open it.. i've yet to open it and i'm no small person... what is it sealed with? alien glue or something???

ok after a while straining a bit.. it opened... lol

*UPDATE* the food itself is delicious and I enjoyed that, but more than half the bag was crumbled into small flakes... still enjoyed them but maybe some cushion when packed may help them not break apart so much?? i'll definitely order these again soon :D

I did order two bags, and both were more than half smaller flakes.. still good to eat :D

Love it.
I use it for smoothies

I've seen negative reviews saying they received mostly crumbs.
People, this is granola and it may crumble during shipping. It's still great to eat or sprinkle in yogurt, cereal, or anything.
When I finish the chunks I grab a handful and eat the crumbs. It tastes the same!
Too sweet for me! Ugh.
Gives my yogurt flavor an texture!
It is crunchy and tasty. The package is easily workable as its color makes it easy to spot.
I use granola at the most 1/4 cup only. I place it on top of my cereal. If I use more, gas begins to develop. This combination makes a great breakfast with fiber.
Good addition to yogurt and there's enough I can store it at work to have a snack ready.
Just what I wanted, it has chucky and small pieces. Great on yogurt to give it a crunch and texture along with a piece of fruit.
First time buying this product which is their granola bars broken up. It works well as a cereal.

I was pleasantly surprised to find cinnamon granola from Nature's Valley considering that I haven't seen their cinnamon granola bars since the early- to mid-80s. The flavor is great and the big chunks are nice for nibbling. I give it 4 stars because of the fine crumbs. They taste fine, but they're not the consistency that I like for a bowl with milk or for topping my yogurt. About 25-35% of net weight is the fine crumbs. I'll eat them, but I'd rather they be at least the size of a rolled oat.

It’s usually just like what it was when it was in the shelves! But I ordered not too long ago, mid September 2023, and it looked really anemic, pale. And it tastes almost sugar free. What happened?!?!

I would love answers for this batch

I literally got fat eating this stuff too often. It's very high in calories, and has very little, to no, nutritional value, beyond the carbs. If you're buying this as a health-food product, don't. If you can afford the extra calories, or are buying for active children, enjoy - it's delicious!
Love this crunchy granola. Always fresh. Tastes better than the bars!. Great for snacking or throwing in a lunch bag with mixed nuts. Makes the perfect mix. Definitely purchasing again.
So good that it goes fast!
Tastes just like the bars, but are good for adding to things like trail mix or yogurt.
Fresh and crunchy, tastes great.
The chunks eat like cookies. Smaller pieces are fine for a bowl of cereal with milk.

I've never been much of a Granola person, that is, until I found the Nature Valley Granola Oats and Honey Crunchy Granola. This stuff tastes amazing and more importantly, holds it texture an crunch even when combined with Yogurt. I really, really love the large chunks of crunchy Granola and highly recommend this one to anyone who loves a good granola. Makes for a great breakfast or even just a nice afternoon snack. Highly recommended to all!
For far the best! Flavored and crunchy

I was really hoping for clusters to eat as a snack, but when they arrived, they were completely crushed and it might as well have been just sprinkles. Still delicious and still usable for yogurt, ice cream, cereal, etc..
Sad day when you go to get your favorite snack and it's no longer there I buy 8 to 10 bags a month what gives my money is no good?
Love this product. Hard to find in some grocery stores and nice to be able to order through Amazon. Highly recommended.

I love this granola. Like, it has become a dangerous addiction. The problem is finding it. I thought I found a source here on Amazon but sadly they are unable to get it to me without thoroughly pulverizing the granola into cinnamon dust. If you are able to find this in a grocery store, I highly recommend. It is amazing in yogurt or even in plain oatmeal to give it a nice crunch. I have no idea what to do with cinnamon dust however, this will be an adventure for sure!
Outstanding

I LOOOOVE this stuff! I used to eat it out of the bag but would eat way too much….so now pour some in a bowl and eat it as a quick snack or just munching. It’s very filling but the taste is incredible!!
This is just what I have been looking for. It’s crunchy and delicious.
This is at best an ok granola

This was our first review: *Crunchy and delicious, great snack right out of the bag. We like to add our own dried fruit and pumpkin seeds, so this is perfect.
And this was our second review:**Some bags do get pretty crushed in shipping, so instead of chunks to snack on out of hand, like the bags from a brick and mortar store, it's sometimes mostly all crumbs--still great on yoghurt or as cereal to eat with a spoon, but disappointing to people who like all chunks for snacking. We like it either way, but ***why is Amazon's packing so careless? I took off a star for bags crushed in shipping, but ordered more anyway. ***and the next order was crushed even worse! One bag broke open and cereal scattered all over the packing box, due to a large heavy bottle packed in the same box, rolling around unsecured. Amazon graciously refunded, but I sure wish they could solve packing problems!***

And this is the last: ****same old old same old, badly packed, absurdly large box with an unsecured glass bottle rolling around. It crushed the granola to crumbs. Sigh, guess I'll make my own from here on out. Too bad about the shipping. We do like this granola.
Delivered on time and packaged well.

This is great granola. Yummy and crunchy and full of flavor. I add it to cereal or oatmeal, and sometimes we have it as a snack. And one of us just has a bowl of it—all by itself—for breakfast—with some milk, of course. Anyway, it’s great.
Great for oatmeal or yogurt
This granola is crunchy. I have been eating this brand of granola since I was a kid, and it is still delicious.
SO GOOD
Travel, camping and more!

This is actually not cereal. The label does say something like "24 bars". I didn't know what that meant because I thought I was buying granola cereal. It is in fact broken up granola bars. It's too sweet for my tastes, and has the light crispness of bars rather than the density of granola cereal. I've never seen anything like it-- sold as granola 😔

Every time I purchase these I have to place then in a container to sort out the pieces from the crumbs ,
an its a shame
to these are so so good
nice mix of cinnamon an a good flavor but who don't enjoy granola
Price too high
Great with yogurt or in milk.

Trying to eat healthier so thought I'd give this a try. It's really good! I just have to watch how much I eat. Even though it seems to be in low calories, 1/4 cup is 120 calories. That isn't very many at all.
We love it. Best taste and have yet to be disappointed. Worth the buy

This granola is far too sweet. Though it has 7 grams of sugar, 14% of one's daily allowance per serving, the serving size is only 1/4 cup, far less than I serve myself for breakfast, which is at least 3/4 cup. At 3/4 cup, there's 21 grams of sugar, 42% of one's daily allowance. It tastes too sweet, and there's little flavor to taste. I try to minimize sugar and salt in my diet, and I go for flavor. Sugar is addictive, and it's not nutritious.
Hey you're taking bites of a bar that cost lots of cash now just toss a bit in your mouth for way less cash. Add these bits to yogurt for a fun crunch. Luv them.

Tastes kinda stale and bland doesn’t havent a taste definitely not what I expected. If you eat it with yogurt u can’t really taste the staleness but if you eat it by itself it doesn’t taste the greatest an there’s little to no flavor.
Great on yogurt. Cinnamon is my favorite Nature Valley flavor.

Can't say much about this granola except that it tastes good and is crunchy. The problem is in the shipping where the granola gets crushed and you're basically left with powder and crushed granola. I don't think it has to do much with the product itself except the packaging unless it came that way from the manufacturer.

I loved this granola. Past tense, because the last batch I received was not the same. I buy this granola specifically for the sweetness and it wasn’t there. I hope they didn’t change the recipe because there is a less sugar option out there. Don’t change this one!

I thought I was ordering normal granola, but these are almost like chunks of the bars that broke apart. Kids still loved it and easier than trying to take a bite out of one of the hard bars. Overall happy, just didn't realize the chunks would be so big.
Can't get enough Cinnamon! These little chunks allow me to take just enough to satisfy, without opening a whole granola bar. The flavor is great and I added these to my subscribe and save orders!
These are literally broken pieces of granola bar. Very tasty, but quite large for putting in milk or yogurt or anything like that.
This was an unexpected surprise, tastes good eaten out of the bag or added to yogourt
It did not taste the same as when I buy it here

I love this stuff. Same price on Amazon as in my local grocery store.
It's just a bunch of granola bars broken up. The only downside of having them shipped is that they can get a little more smashed up and you'll have a bit more "loose granola" at the bottom of the bag.
